<title level="1" right="Trait">[Rage](/Traits.aspx?ID=135)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 87 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

You must be raging to use abilities with the rage trait, and they end automatically when you stop raging.
